text:
Chinnathambi, head master of Chinnanur Panchayat Union Primary School near Jolarpettai, has been suspended on charges of coming to school in an inebriated condition.

According to sources, the public locked the school building charging that Chinnathambi came to the school in drunken state, as he often does on last Saturday. Jolarpettai Assistant Elementary Education Officer Thennavan inspected the school and conducted enquiry.

Mr.Chinnathambi was suspended on Tuesday.
title: Head Master suspended
